title: Sebi bars Reliance Home Finance, Anil Ambani, 3 others from securities market - India Today
content: Sebi bars Reliance Home Finance, Anil Ambani, 3 others from securities market  India Today
description: Sebi has restrained Reliance Home Finance Ltd, industrialist Anil Ambani and three other individuals from the securities market for allegedly siphoning off funds from the company.
